page.title: 06Computer Links at Medstead
page.content:
Medstead School is linked to a many schools in the UK by means of the Times Network for schools.
In particular the school is twinned with Audley Junior School, Birmingham. This is a large inner city urban junior school, completely different from Medstead.
Both schools belong to the IBM PCs in schools project, and children from the two schools communicate regularly by means of the Times Network.
Children from Audley School have visited Medstead and stayed overnight with their penfriends, and a return visit is planned for 1986.
